biotools.summary: LRensemble (LR Ensemble Localization Predictor) predicts 4 major locations for Yeast Proteins: Cytosol, Mitochondrion, Nucleus, Secretory. The prediction method is to build an ensemble over different available localization predictors. In the current version, our predict collects prediction results from up to 6 predictors and Logistic Regression is used as the ensemble algorithm.
